definition.text: Is a collection of servers running on a single Node.js process.

paragraphs.text: Web Server: Serves all the JS files that form the User Interface to the browser.
Web Sockets Server: Enables the UI to reach the Client via WS.
Events Server: Enables the UI to communicate with the Task Manager Server and all of the Task Servers process instances via events over WS.
Task Manager Server: Manges Task Servers processes based on users commands.
All of these servers are custom built—in-house—for Superalgos. We prefer to build on top of rock-solid, widely-used, low-level libraries only, like WS, for instance.
